resources.string: • To search for a new city, tap on the text box at the top, type in your city, and tap on the magnifying glass icon to search for it.
• To save a city to your device, tap the star in the top right corner.
• To view your saved cities, tap the map icon in the top left corner.
• To view weather attributes in metric measurements, tap on the F/C switch in the middle of the screen.
• To view more details of the current city you are viewing (such as its hourly and daily forecast), tap on the white button at the bottom.
